-Description:

GTA Vice City takes place years before GTA 3 in 1986. Tommy Vercetti is finally released from prison, as one of the villains of the Forelli gang he had spent 15 years in family name in prison. Finally he was released and Sonny Forelli his former boss learns of the situation after all were 15 years. But Sonny knows that the situation is not very good with the return of Tommy the streets. In 1971 Tommy did the dirty service by Sonny Liberty City which upset a lot of other families and gangs because Tommy just created havoc in Liberty City and this created many problems on its respect towards the other familas.

Until so dirt Sonny Forelli Family and the indictments were filed, but Tommy agreed to take the blame for everything on behalf of the family and spend 15 years in prison in the name of Sonny. Now with the return of Tommy the streets and so dirt tend to have done Sonny knew he could not allow it in the streets of Liberty City.

Then Sonny and his family have a brilliant idea. Joining hunger with the desire to eat Sonny knew Tommy was smart and decides to send him to a negotiation in the southern part of the city Vice City. Sonny had already prepared for the situation go wrong encrencando Tommy completely. Tommy would have to change some money for drugs and that negotiation would have to go wrong. So Tommy would have to recover the money in Vice City and for this to take some properties and get some respect in the streets and so Sonny would take possession of this whole situation, and in a few months Sonny would go to Vice City to pay a visit to Tommy. Sonny plan is perfect, but there is a serious mistake, he forgot who Tommy Vercetti was.
